TopicTitle: Last person to post is the winner

Articles.Content:
oh god that looked like it hurt

nope... That\'s nothing.

Small ant bite hurts more than that

Edmond Hillary, the first person to climb Mount Everest, did so accidentally while chasing a bird.

Humans can survive underwater, but not for very long.

The atomic weight of Germanium is 72.64.

The Schrodinger\'s cat paradox outlines a situation in which a cat in a box must be considered, for all intents and purposes, simultaneously alive and dead. Schrodinger created this paradox as a justification for killing cats.

If you have trouble with simple counting, use the following mneumonic device: One, comes before two, comes before sixty, comes after twelve, comes before six-trillion, comes after five-hundred-and-four. This will make your earlier counting difficulties seem like no big deal.

The first commercial air flight took place in 1914. Everyone involved screamed the entire way.

During the Great Depression, the Tennessee Valley Authority outlawed pet rabbits, forcing many to hot glue-gun long ears onto their pet mice.

The square root of rope is string.

89% of magic tricks are not magic. Technically, they are sorcery.

Avocados have the highest fiber and calories of any fruit. They can be found in Australians.

In Victorian England, commoners were not allowed to look directly at the Queen. Due to the belief at the time that the poor had the ability to steal thoughts. Science now believes that less than 4% of poor people are able to do this.

In 1862 Abraham Lincoln signed The Emancipation Proclamation, freeing the slaves. Like everything he did, Lincoln freed the slaves while sleepwalking, and later had no memory of the event.

Whales are twice as intelligent and three times as delicious as humans.

The automobile brake was not invented until 1895. Before this, someone had to remain in the car at all times, driving in circles until passengers returned from their errands.

To make a photocopier, simply photocopy a mirror.

Dreams are the subconscious minds way of reminding people to go to school naked and have their teeth fall out.

Diamonds are made when coal is put under intense pressure. When diamonds put under intense pressure, they become foam pellets, commonly used today as packing material.

Before the invention of scrambled eggs in 1912, the typical breakfast was either whole eggs still in the shell, or scrambled rocks.

The first person to prove that cows milk is drinkable was very, very thirsty.

At some point in their lives, one in six children will be abducted by the dutch.

Before the Wright brothers invented the airplane, anyone wanting to fly anywhere had to eat 200 pounds of Helium.

Halley\'s Comet can be seen orbiting the Earth every 76 years. For the remaining 75, it retreats into the heart of the Sun, where it hibernates undisturbed.
It goes on and on and on and on
